mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 給与.就業時間履歴 (就業時間ID, 従業員ID, 開始日, 開始時刻, 終了日, 終了時刻, 休憩時間, 深夜休憩時間) VALUES (#{id}, #{employeeNumber.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDateTime.value.date.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDateTime.value.time.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endDateTime.value.date.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endDateTime.value.time.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.daytimeBreakTime.value.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.nightBreakTime.value.value});

INSERT INTO 給与.就業時間 (従業員ID, 就業時間ID, 開始日, 開始時刻, 終了日, 終了時刻, 休憩時間, 深夜休憩時間) VALUES (#{employeeNumber.value}, #{workTimeId}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDateTime.value.date.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDateTime.value.time.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endDateTime.value.date.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endDateTime.value.time.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.daytimeBreakTime.value.value}, #{work.actualWorkDateTime.nightBreakTime.value.value});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 給与.就業時間 WHERE 従業員ID = #{employeeNumber.value} and 開始日 = #{startDateTime.value.date.value}
mapper.select: SELECT 就業時間.従業員ID as "employeeNumber.value", 就業時間.開始日 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDateTime.value.date.value", 就業時間.開始時刻 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.startDateTime.value.time.value", 就業時間.終了日 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endDateTime.value.date.value", 就業時間.終了時刻 as "actualWorkDateTime.workRange.endDateTime.value.time.value", 就業時間.休憩時間 as "actualWorkDateTime.daytimeBreakTime.value.value", 就業時間.深夜休憩時間 as "actualWorkDateTime.nightBreakTime.value.value" FROM 給与.就業時間 as 就業時間 WHERE 就業時間.従業員ID = #{employeeNumber.value} AND to_char(就業時間.開始日,'yyyymm') = #{yearMonth}
